column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The thing about spending lots of time in France is you tend to scoff at places that sell croissants for $4 apiece (roughly 4x price of many boulangeries). But...the thing about spending lots of time in France - and being a baker - is you have REALLY SUPER HIGH expectations for baked goods
column2: some of which aren't even made in most bakeries here
column3: and you start to get reaaaaally desperate. All of the sudden
